title: (x) Basic serif all-caps font - Times {Stephen}
content:
please help me find a font with all-caps and serifs, like the image posted. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504012156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/swin_6035.jpg)
author: jrgott

comments.content: Uhm, it seems very simple: for me [Times Roman SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504012156/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/times_roman_sc/) or [Nimbus Roman SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504012156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/nimbus-roman-no-9/nimbus-roman-no9-sc-t-regular/win-t1/34971/).
